00013 #include <mcMd/mcSimulation/McSystem.h>
00014 #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00015 #include <mcMd/potentials/pair/McPairPotential.h>
00016 #endif
00017 #include <mcMd/species/HomopolymerSG.h>
00018 #include <util/global.h>

00020 namespace McMd
00021 {
00022 
00023    using namespace Util;
00024 
00025    /* 
00026    * Constructor
00027    */
00028    HomopolymerSemiGrandMove::HomopolymerSemiGrandMove(McSystem& system) : 
00029       SystemMove(system),
00030       speciesId_(-1)
00031    {} 
00032    
00033    /* 
00034    * Read parameter speciesId.
00035    */
00036    void HomopolymerSemiGrandMove::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00037    {
00038       // Read parameters
00039       readProbability(in);
00040       read<int>(in, "speciesId", speciesId_);
00041 
00042       // Cast the Species to HomopolymerSG
00043       speciesPtr_ = dynamic_cast<HomopolymerSG*>(&(simulation().species(speciesId_)));
00044       if (!speciesPtr_) {
00045          UTIL_THROW("Error: Species must be HomopolymerSG");
00046       }
00047   
00048    }
00049 
00050    /* 
00051    * Generate, attempt and accept or reject a Monte Carlo move.
00052    */
00053    bool HomopolymerSemiGrandMove::move() 
00054    {
00055       incrementNAttempt();
00056       Molecule& molecule = system().randomMolecule(speciesId_);
00057 
00058       #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00059       // Calculate pair energy for the chosen molecule
00060       double oldEnergy = system().pairPotential().moleculeEnergy(molecule);
00061       #endif
00062 
00063       // Toggle state of the molecule
00064       int oldStateId = speciesPtr_->mutator().moleculeStateId(molecule);
00065       int newStateId = (oldStateId == 0) ? 1 : 0;
00066       speciesPtr_->mutator().setMoleculeState(molecule, newStateId);
00067 
00068       #ifdef INTER_NOPAIR 
00069 
00070       bool   accept = true;
00071 
00072       #else // ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00073 
00074       // Recalculate pair energy for the molecule
00075       double newEnergy = system().pairPotential().moleculeEnergy(molecule);
00076 
00077       // Decide whether to accept or reject
00078       double oldWeight = speciesPtr_->mutator().stateWeight(oldStateId);
00079       double newWeight = speciesPtr_->mutator().stateWeight(newStateId);
00080       double ratio  = boltzmann(newEnergy - oldEnergy)*newWeight/oldWeight;
00081       bool   accept = random().metropolis(ratio);
00082    
00083       #endif
00084 
00085       if (accept) {
00086 
00087          incrementNAccept();
00088 
00089       } else {
00090 
00091          // Revert chosen molecule to original state
00092          speciesPtr_->mutator().setMoleculeState(molecule, oldStateId);
00093 
00094       }
00095 
00096       return accept;
00097    }
00098 
00099 }
00100 #endif
